name: Stealing for the Rocket
description:
STEALING FOR THE ROCKET ! the space odyssey of 4 cowboys lost on a boring planet.

Looks like there are raw materials to restart your ship not far from the crash site... Oh no ... Looks like there is also another rocket .. hmm .. And not enough resources to restart two rockets.

Good thing you brought your particle destroying laser gun with you!

Stealing for the Rocket is a competitive multiplayer game that can be played with at least two players in 1v1 or 2v2.

Your objective as a dashing cowboy from the future is to collect the materials needed to restart the rocket and bring it back to your pod before the other team. Are you going to stay on this boring sand planet? Or will you shoot some nasty boys and run away instead?

For the controls : R to reload and to drop the ressources : 

Download Stealing for the Rocket now!

Let us know your feedback in the comments, and enjoy the game! 🙂


Teams :

Felix Coeugniet - https://www.artstation.com/swissknifev1
